extendedInfo.description: Jigsaw Puzzle is a beautiful recreation of real jigsaw puzzles.  Every puzzle is cut differently, so no two are the same.  You can choose from 4 to 400 pieces on tablets or up to 100 pieces on phones.  Move loose pieces to the margins and zoom in and out to focus on one area.  Assemble pieces into groups, then move and connect the groups.  Jigsaw Puzzle saves your works in progress so you can return and work on them any time.Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp.  If you want a greater challenge, turn on Piece Rotation.  For the truly ambitious, there are also Tournament and Patterns packs.More than 4,000 jigsaw puzzles are available for download including lots of free packs, and new puzzles are added weekly.  You can even make puzzles from your photos.  There are more than 40 achievements to be earned and you can share completed puzzles with friends and family on Facebook.Download Jigsaw Puzzle today and see you've been missing.FEATURES â¢ You can play on your phone or tablet!â¢ Over 4000 beautiful, high-definition jigsaw puzzles! â¢ Downloadable content (including FREE puzzles) â¢ Constantly updated puzzle packs â¢ Play puzzles up to 400 pieces! â¢ Turn your personal photos into your own custom puzzles! â¢ Move pieces in groups â¢ Scatter pieces out of the puzzle area with a single command â¢ Optionally rotate pieces for a greater challenge â¢ Challenge yourself with the special Tournament Pack â¢ Randomized pieces -- no two puzzles are the same â¢ Work on more than one puzzle at a time â¢ Saves every puzzle you've ever solved â¢ Share completed puzzles with your friends â¢ 40+ distinct achievements to unlock

reviews.title: What a rip!
reviews.comment: I love to put together puzzles, but when pieces are missing, you have to pay to upgrade..that\'s BS! This game sucks.
reviews.author: Maria Viether

reviews.title: Missing pieces!
reviews.comment: The app is always missing pieces. I\'ve clicked scatter pieces and it never works. My dog eats my puzzle pieces and now this app does too! Geeze can\'t I finish one puzzle in peace!
reviews.author: Erica Fagundes

reviews.title: Undesided
reviews.comment: I got this puzzle game only because it says you can use your own pix. It tells you once you load the game you have to pay for that. I deleted the game without playing it. Gave a 3 star to be fair.
reviews.author: Angie Medici

reviews.title: Problem right off the bat
reviews.comment: Just installed. Counted my pieces all were there but magicly one piece missing upon completion. Now I cant move on
reviews.author: debbi apke

reviews.title: Missing pieces
reviews.comment: As I\'m playing it seems that half the time one or two pieces disapeare of go far enough off screen that you can\'t get it I have siblings less anoying than this game!
reviews.author: Kathy Ryle

reviews.comment: I like this game it keeps me busy when I\'m not doing anything. People are saying there are missing pieces or one is missing. They need to move the whole board and the other peices are there. That\'s why your missing just one piece.
reviews.author: Ilene Rodriguez

reviews.title: Only had for 2 days and already deleted it off my phone!
reviews.comment: Not all puzzle pieces appear so I couldn\'t fully complete the puzzles w/16 or more pieces. Irritating. Also could not find how to unlock puzzles w/81+ pieces... Instructions? And every time I go back to the main menu an add for another game comes up but its very slow on appearing so it looks like you\'re at the main menu so you click on \"play\" and then all sudden the add for whatever game starts downloading. Very aggravating!
reviews.author: Rachel Bounds

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I bought new puzzles now it wont let me use the puzzles I\'ve purchased.  It was working fine no missing pieces now I can\'t do any of my puzzles.

reviews.title: Dissapointed
